title: Amazon Sales Rank KDP Calculator
description:
Hey guys, welcome to the Kindlepreneur presentation of the Amazon Sales Rank Calculator.  This KDP Calculator uses the Amazon Best Sellers Rank and converts that number into a sales per day.  

You can check the Kindle Sales Rank Calculator here:
http://kindlepreneur.com/amazon-kdp-sales-rank-calculator/

In essence, this free self-publishing tool will help you to figure out what niches or keywords are more profitable and which self proclaimed gurus actually make the kind of money they say they do with their ebook sales.   

Also, if you would like to download your own copy and put it on your wordpress website, you can download it here or through your normal Wordpress means: 
https://wordpress.org/plugins/kindle-best-seller-calculator/

While this Amazon Sales Ranking Calculator is easy to use and will adequately take the Kindle Best Sellers rank and turn it into something of use, it does have its limitations.
